name: wlkcl

comment: A walk has length ` # ( F ) ` , which is an integer. Formerly proven for an Eulerian path, see ~ eupthcl . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 18-Feb-2021.)
